issue.title: [JS] Export Vector type definitions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1544](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1544). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should export the Vector type definitions on the main Arrow export.
